# Hire purchase payment schedule
put py file into c:\yourpython37\Lib\ folder
how to use:

	Principle = 1000000
	annum interest rate = 15%
	tenor = 60 month
call function :
		from HP_schedule_mth import hpbymonth as hp
		hp(1000000,.15,60)
